subject: AI & Agents
title: Consensus Patterns: Vote, Judge, Debate
description: A micro-lesson that makes Consensus Patterns: Vote, Judge, Debate usable.

hook.text: One model answer is fast. Two answers can be safer. Three answers can be chaos.

buildup.text: Consensus reduces single-shot mistakes, but it adds cost and latency.

discovery.text: Patterns: vote on options, judge between two drafts, or debate with a moderator.

climax.text: Make disagreement visible: show alternatives or ask the user to choose.
